title: Lena Rådström Baastad
text:
"Lena" Therese Rådström Baastad, <a href="n%C3%A9e">née</a> "Larsson", (born 4 April 1974) is a Swedish politician of the <a href="Swedish%20Social%20Democratic%20Party">Social Democratic Party</a> who served as <a href="Swedish%20Social%20Democratic%20Party">Secretary-General of the Social Democratic Party</a> from 2016 to 2021. She previously served as <a href="%C3%96rebro%20Municipality">Mayor of Örebro Municipality</a> from 2011 to 2016.
During the spring of 2016, between serving as Mayor and before being elected Secretary-General, Rådström Baastad worked as a <a href="consultant">consultant</a> at Gaia Leadership. She was <a href="Member%20of%20the%20Riksdag">Member of the Riksdag</a>, representing <a href="%C3%96rebro%20County">Örebro County</a>, from September 2018 until her resignation in September 2021.
